Sentencas: Substrate- and thickness-related effects on the oxygen surface exchange of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) thin films were investigated to understand better cathode reactivity in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Substrate and Thickness Effects on the Oxygen Surface Exchange of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 Thin Films

Sentencas: Epitaxial (100)-oriented LSM films were fabricated on (100)-SrTiO3 and (110)-NdGaO3 substrates and were characterized using electrical conductivity relaxation.
Titulo: Substrate and Thickness Effects on the Oxygen Surface Exchange of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 Thin Films

Sentencas: A strong substrate effect on the chemical surface exchange coefficient (k(chem)) was observed, with a higher k(chem), found for films on SrTiO3 than those on NdGaO3.
Titulo: Substrate and Thickness Effects on the Oxygen Surface Exchange of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 Thin Films

Sentencas: Two distinct activation energies (E-a) were observed for k(chem), which were assigned to two parallel exchange processes; the relative contributions from each depended on the substrate, film thickness, and temperature.
Titulo: Substrate and Thickness Effects on the Oxygen Surface Exchange of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 Thin Films

Sentencas: For films coherently strained to the substrates, k(chem) values differed by almost an order of magnitude, whereas E-a was similar to 4.5 (+/- 0.1) eV on both substrates.
Titulo: Substrate and Thickness Effects on the Oxygen Surface Exchange of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 Thin Films

Sentencas: For relaxed films, k(chem) values differed only by a factor of 2, and E-a was similar to 0.75 (+/- 0.1) eV on both substrates.
Titulo: Substrate and Thickness Effects on the Oxygen Surface Exchange of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 Thin Films

Sentencas: We discuss the strain effect relative to the native surface exchange and the thickness effect relative to the extended defect populations in the films.
Titulo: Substrate and Thickness Effects on the Oxygen Surface Exchange of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 Thin Films

Sentencas: The outcome of this study sheds light on how microstructural features affect surface chemistry in modified cathodes.
Titulo: Substrate and Thickness Effects on the Oxygen Surface Exchange of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 Thin Films
